text:
Oh I do enjoy falling asleep to the pleasant aroma of ... rotting industrial waste. 

@EnvAgencyMids why not come round for a sleepover? Since 2000+ complaints in a single weekend isn‚Äôt enough for you to take any action, maybe living near the landfill for a while would help?

@SimonTagg @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @KeeleUniversity @StaffsFire @NewsNBC @AaronBell4NUL I think after this is sorted we need to look back through meetings and minutes. People raised concerns, they didn't seem to matter. 

Get this sorted and then get educated as to WHO and HOW this was allowed to happen, more waste dumped, and then enact your democratic vote.

@EnvAgencyMids It is now after 2.30am, we cannot sleep, where are you? Why haven't you got control of this? Is you equipment now 'turned on'? The management of the EA needs review, this has been going on for years.

@scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL This has been happening for years, it is people power that has got a response. We need to come together right now but in the long term look at WHO and HOW we got to this point. Some members of the council and EA need looking at, very closely.
@SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Sainsburys and Talke up near the A34 I could smell it about 9pm tonight. Certainly smells funny, if not a health risk.
